title: TV On The Radio  Wolf Like Me

lastfm.summary: "Wolf Like Me" is the first single from American art rock band TV on the Radio's second studio album Return to Cookie Mountain, released in the United Kingdom on July 25, 2006 on 4AD. The single's B-side was the song "Things You Can Do", which was also available as a bonus track on the U.S. release of Return to Cookie Mountain. The song is the band's most successful single in the United States, where it peaked at #37 on the Billboard Hot Modern Rock Tracks chart in 2006, and was their second top 100 hit in the UK, where it peaked at #89. Read more on Last.fm.
lastfm.title: Wolf Like Me
